trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> tipi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica uno dei seguenti casi, questo metodo restituisce un oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo specificato.

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>può essere verificata.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>non può essere estratto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione un valore che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se patternInterface è un valore supportato; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invia una richiesta per attivare il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> non è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> può essere verificata.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System%23Windows%23Automation%23Provider%23IToggleProvider%23Toggle%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System%23Windows%23Automation%23Provider%23IToggleProvider%23Toggle%2A> invece.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the checked states of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Scorre gli stati selezionati del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> non è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> non può essere estratto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato di selezione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di selezione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.
